scripts.pushTags: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --major && yarn pushTags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --minor && yarn pushTags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && yarn version --patch && yarn pushTags
scripts.postversion: git reset --soft HEAD~1 && git reset build/ && git commit -m "v%npm_package_version%"
